animeTitle: I Use the Gods of Daxia to Sweep the World
otherNames: Wo Yi Da Xia Zhu Shen Heng Tui Quan Qiu, I Use the Gods of Daxia to Sweep the World, Wǒ Yǐ Dà Xià Zhū Shén Héng Tuī Quán Qiú, 我以大夏诸神横推全球
synopsis: In the era of myth revival, Daxia has no gods to protect it because of the civilizational fault, and is bullied by the great powers? I have brought hundreds of millions of gods from Daxia over the past five thousand years. My gods of Daxia can sweep the world!
